title: Mr Meeseeks

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Select a player and perform their action for them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Hang immunity (lost after night 6)
-Roleblock immunity
-Conversion immunity
-Redirection immunity
-Control immunity
-Players will know they were visited by a Meeseeks
-You will visit your target’s target instead of them
-If you survive to night 6, you become enraged and will attack your next target
-If the action you attempt to do would be stopped for whatever reason, such as a healing role protecting your target’s kill, it will not count to your goal
-If you attempt to do an action that the host would deem impossible (such as copying another player’s role), then you will do a powerful attack to your selected target
-Once you complete your goal, you will win and cease to exist. This may not be stopped

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully complete 3 tasks for 3 separate people, or kill your target (kill 3 people if enraged)

desc:
Post 3025
_I’m Mr Meeseeks, look at me!_
